entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
